```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tufte)
# invalidate cache when the tufte version changes
knitr::opts_chunk$set(tidy = FALSE, cache.extra = packageVersion('tufte'),echo = FALSE,
                      comment = "%%",
                      warning = FALSE,
                      message = FALSE)
options(htmltools.dir.version = FALSE)
```

## Q7:Uses knitr caching


```{r, starwars-plot, fig.cap ='A ggplot ofStarwars data', message=FALSE, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
starwars %>% 
  filter(species == "Human") %>% 
ggplot() +
  aes(x = height, 
      y = mass) +
  geom_point()
```

We can see in Figure \@ref(fig:starwars-plot)...

We need a chunk label and a chunk caption for cross-referencing to work!

```{r starwars-tbl}
starwars %>% 
  filter(species == "Human")  %>% 
  select(name, 
         height, 
         mass, 
         homeworld) %>% 
  knitr::kable(caption = "A knitr kable table of starwars data")
```

We can see in Table \@ref(tab:starwars-tbl) â€¦
